questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Painted rocks and 2 plants beside it

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A garden corner with plants and painted rocks

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The sky
B) The painted rocks
C) The house
D) The trees

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) Painted rocks
D) A bird

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A river
B) A pathway
C) Plants and rocks
D) A car

What kind of plants are visible in the photo?
A) Trees
B) Bushes
C) Grassy plants
D) Flowering plants

What is the color of the painted rocks?
A) Blue and green
B) Red, blue, green, purple, pink and orange 
C) Yellow and orange
D) Purple and pink

What is the ground covered with in the photo?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Gravel and dry leaves
D) Concrete

How many distinct plants are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is written on some of the painted rocks?  
A) Names  
B) Inspirational messages  
C) Love text  
D) Drawings

What color is the house wall?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White/ beige
D) Yellow

Which element is not present in the photo?
A) Water
B) Rocks
C) Plants
D) House wall

What is the condition of the plants in the photo?
A) They are flowering
B) They are dry and withered
C) They are green and healthy
D) They are freshly planted

What is the texture of the house wall?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Textured with horizontal lines
D) Shiny

What is the color of the siding on the house wall?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Beige
D) White

What is the shape of the painted rocks?
A) Round
B) Square
C) Irregular
D) Triangular

How are the rocks arranged?
A) Randomly scattered
B) In a neat pile
C) In a straight line
D) In a circular pattern

What is the condition of the ground in the photo?
A) Wet and muddy
B) Covered with dry leaves and gravel
C) Snowy
D) Covered with grass

What is the dominant color of the plants in the photo?
A) Green
B) Yellow
C) Brown
D) Red

What kind of artwork is featured in the photo?
A) Painted rocks
B) Sculptures
C) Paintings
D) Murals

What is the condition of the house wall?
A) Newly painted
B) Slightly dirty
C) Damaged
D) Covered with graffiti

How many colors are visible on the painted rocks?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four or more

What is the texture of the ground in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rocky and Muddy
C) Sandy
D) Muddy

What kind of weathering is visible on the house wall?
A) Rust
B) Paint peeling
C) Dirt marks
D) Cracks

What type of plant is on the right side of the photo?
A) A flowering plant
B) A grass-like plant
C) A tree sapling
D) A succulent

What is the arrangement of the plants in the photo?
A) In a straight line
B) Clustered together
C) Randomly placed
D) Symmetrically placed

What is the color of the gravel on the ground?
A) White
B) Brown
C) Pinkish
D) Gray

What is the primary feature of the garden area?
A) Flowers
B) Trees
C) Painted rocks and plants 
D) Water feature

What kind of boundary is visible in the photo?
A) A wooden fence
B) A metal fence
C) A hedge
D) A stone wall

What is the primary visual contrast in the photo?
A) Between the plants and the gravel
B) Between the house wall and the plants
C) Between the painted rocks and the gravel
D) Between the fence and the house wall

What is the surface the plants and rocks are on?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) Gravel
D) Concrete

What is the condition of the siding in the background?
A) New and clean
B) Slightly covered with dust/mud
C) Painted recently
D) Broken and damaged

What type of material is the wooden structure on the left made of?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Stone
